title: BRIEF-Silgan Announces Redemption Of All Of Its Outstanding 5 Pct Senior Notes
text: March 16, 2018 / 1:09 PM / Updated 10 minutes ago BRIEF-Silgan Announces Redemption Of All Of Its Outstanding 5 Pct Senior Notes Reuters Staff March 16 (Reuters) - Silgan Holdings Inc: * SILGAN ANNOUNCES REDEMPTION OF ALL OF ITS OUTSTANDING 5% SENIOR NOTES * SILGAN - GAVE IRREVOCABLE NOTICE FOR REDEMPTION OF ALL $280 MILLION AGGREGATE PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF REMAINING OUTSTANDING 5% SENIOR NOTES DUE 2020​ * SILGAN HOLDINGS INC - WILL FUND THE REDEMPTION WITH REVOLVING LOAN BORROWINGS UNDER ITS SENIOR SECURED CREDIT FACILITY AND CASH ON HAND * SILGAN HOLDINGS INC - TO REDEEM SENIOR NOTES AT PRICE OF 100 PERCENT OF PRINCIPAL AMOUNT PLUS ACCRUED, UNPAID INTEREST UP TO REDEMPTION DATE​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
